_sText: BOTACTI0N BY UNREAL This is basicly a training map. Add a few bots, or even play with your friends to perfect your skills. This map "includes" a special system that allows players to see through the walls, use it at your will. FAQ Q: Will this get me VAC banned? A: Norsh. Q: Sure? A: Yersh. Q: Am I gay? A: Yersh. Q: ????? A: www.fragxl.com How to? You MUST have r_3dsky command set to "1". Start by adding a few bots to the enemy team (bot_add (t or ct)), buy a weapon and start the massacre. The goal of this map is to simply train your abilities, such as prefiring, spraying and etc. Hope you like it.
